sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../../context/AuthContext'; import { useBorrow } from '../../../context/BorrowContext'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const { borrowBook } = useBorrow(); const featuredBooks = [ { id: 1, title: "The Psychology of Money", author: "Morgan Housel", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71TRUbzcvaL._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.6, genre: "Finance", description: "Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness doing well with money isn't necessarily about what you know. It's about how you behave. And behavior is hard to teach, even to really smart people.", available: true }, { id: 2, title: "Atomic Habits", author: "James Clear", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81bGKUa1e0L._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.8, genre: "Self-Help", description: "No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving--every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.", available: true }, { id: 3, title: "Deep Work", author: "Cal Newport", cover: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71QKQ9mwV7L._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg", rating: 4.5, genre: "Productivity", description: "Deep work is the ability to focus without distraction on a cognitively demanding task. It's a skill that allows you to quickly master complicated information and produce better results in less time.", available: true } ]; const newArrivals = [ { id: 1, title: "Iron Flame", author: "Rebecca Yarros", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9781649374172.jpg", date: "2025-01-25", genre: "Fantasy", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 2, title: "The Heaven & Earth Grocery Store", author: "James McBride", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593422946.jpg", date: "2025-01-22", genre: "Historical Fiction", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 3, title: "House of Flame and Shadow", author: "Sarah J. Maas", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9781635574104.jpg", date: "2025-01-15", genre: "Fantasy", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 4, title: "Fourth Wing", author: "Rebecca Yarros", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9781649374042.jpg", date: "2025-01-10", genre: "Fantasy", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 5, title: "The Creative Act", author: "Rick Rubin", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593652886.jpg", date: "2025-01-05", genre: "Self-Help", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 6, title: "Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow", author: "Gabrielle Zevin", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593321201.jpg", date: "2025-01-01", genre: "Literary Fiction", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 7, title: "Hello Beautiful", author: "Ann Napolitano", cover: "https://prodimage.images-bn.com/pimages/9780593243732_p0_v2_s1200x630.jpg", date: "2025-01-18", genre: "Contemporary Fiction", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 8, title: "Demon Copperhead", author: "Barbara Kingsolver", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780063251922.jpg", date: "2025-01-12", genre: "Literary Fiction", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 9, title: "Yellowface", author: "R.F. Kuang", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780063250833.jpg", date: "2025-01-08", genre: "Thriller", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true }, { id: 10, title: "Happy Place", author: "Emily Henry", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593441275.jpg", date: "2025-01-03", genre: "Romance", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", available: true } ]; const bookOfDay = { title: "Lessons in Chemistry", author: "Bonnie Garmus", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1634748496i/58065033.jpg", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", rating: 4.6, available: true }; const announcements = [ { id: 1, title: "Summer Reading Challenge", date: "2025-02-01", description: "Join our summer reading challenge and win exciting prizes! Read 10 books in 3 months to qualify.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1456513080510-7bf3a84b82f8?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" }, { id: 2, title: "Author Meet & Greet", date: "2025-02-15", description: "Meet bestselling author James Clear for a book signing and discussion session.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1475721027785-f74eccf877e2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" }, { id: 3, title: "New Book Club", date: "2025-02-10", description: "Join our new Science Fiction book club! First meeting discusses 'Project Hail Mary'.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1532012197267-da84d127e765?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" } ]; const handleBorrow = (book) => { if (!isAuthenticated) { navigate('/login'); return; } borrowBook(book); navigate('/borrow-history'); }; const handleQuickView = (bookId) => { navigate(`/quick-view/${bookId}`); }; return (

Welcome to Our Library

Discover a world of knowledge with our extensive collection of books. From timeless classics to contemporary bestsellers, we have something for every reader.

Featured Books

{featuredBooks.map((book) => (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

★ {book.rating} {book.genre}

{book.description}

{book.available ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}
))}

New Arrivals

Discover our latest additions to the library collection

{newArrivals.map((book) => (
{ e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = 'https://placehold.co/400x600/1e40af/ffffff?text=' + encodeURIComponent(book.title); }} />
New {book.genre}

{book.title}

by {book.author}

Added {new Date(book.date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}

{book.available ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}
))}

Book of the Day

⭐ {bookOfDay.rating}

{bookOfDay.title}

by {bookOfDay.author}

{bookOfDay.description}

{bookOfDay.available ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}

Library Updates

{announcements.map((announcement) => (

{announcement.title}

{announcement.date}

{announcement.description}

))}

Visit Us

📍 Main Branch

123 Library Street

Open: Mon-Sat, 9 AM - 8 PM

📞 Contact Us

Phone: (555) 123-4567

Email: library@example.com

); }; export default Home;
